blockedMessage.message: Navigation ciblée est actif. Navigation ciblée a été initié par $teacherName$ en utilisant Hapara Highlights. Donc, ce site ne sera pas accessible pour la prochaine fois $time$.

blockedTitle.message: Une activité ciblée est en cours

browserIconActive.description: Browser icon tooltip when a valid user is signed

browserIconInactive.description: Browser icon tooltip when no valid user is signed

browserIconMultipleUsers.description: Browser icon tooltip when multiple users are signed in
browserIconMultipleUsers.message: Hapara Highlights: Plusieurs utilisateurs sont connectés sur Google. Pour résoudre ce problème veuillez vous déconnecter.

diagnosticsButtonSendResults.description: Button to send diagnostic results to Hapara

diagnosticsMessageComplete.description: Message indicating diagnostics run is compmlete

diagnosticsMessageFailedSending.description: Message indicating diagnostics failed to send to Hapara
diagnosticsMessageFailedSending.message: Erreur: Nous n'avons pas pus envoyer le diagnostique

diagnosticsMessageSending.description: Message indicating diagnostics report is being sent to Hapara

diagnosticsSendAlso.description: Message displayed before additional options on successful diagnostics send to Hapara

diagnosticsSendCodeInformation.description: Informational message indicating the diagnostics code to the user
diagnosticsSendCodeInformation.message: Veuiller citer le code $code$ lorsque vous signalez ce problème.

diagnosticsSendSuccess.description: Message indicating diagnostics were successfully sent to Hapara
diagnosticsSendSuccess.message: Un diagnostique a été envoyé à Hapara

diagnosticsStateFailed.description: Used to indicate this test has failed

diagnosticsStatePassed.description: Used to indicate this test has passed

diagnosticsStatePending.description: Used to indicate this test is running

diagnosticsTestCommunicationDescription.message: Vérifiez que la messagerie fonctionne entre cet ordinateur et Hapara

diagnosticsTestCommunicationLatencyMessa.description: Communication success message indicating round-trip time in milliseconds

diagnosticsTestCommunicationPusherError.description: Message indicating pusher failed to connect

diagnosticsTestCommunicationTimeout.description: Message for when testing communication times out
diagnosticsTestCommunicationTimeout.message: [TIMED OUT] pendant le test de communication

diagnosticsTestExtensionDescription.message: Vérifiez que l'extension Hapara Highlights est installée et à jour

diagnosticsTestExtensionNewerVersion.description: Message when there's a newer version available

diagnosticsTestExtensionTooManyChecks.description: Message when chrome throttles our extension update checks
diagnosticsTestExtensionTooManyChecks.message: Trop de vérifications de mise à jour, veuillez essayer de nouveau plus tard

diagnosticsTestExtensionUnknownResponse.description: Message when chrome returns us an known extension status
diagnosticsTestExtensionUnknownResponse.message: Réponse inconnue pour la vérification du mise à jour: $status$

diagnosticsTestGoogleDescription.message: Vérifiez que cet ordinateur peut se connecter à Google

diagnosticsTestHTTPRequestError.description: Generic diagnostics message when an HTTP request fails

diagnosticsTestHaparaDescription.message: Vérifiez que cet ordinateur peut se connecter à Hapara

diagnosticsTestLoggedInDescription.message: Vérifiez qu'il y a au moins un utilisateur connecté à Google

diagnosticsTestLoggedInErrorRequesting.description: Message when the diagnostics page gets an error from the extension
diagnosticsTestLoggedInErrorRequesting.message: Erreur pendant la demande d'information utilisateurs de l'extension: $error$

diagnosticsTestLoggedInFoundUsers.description: Message indicating what users were found

diagnosticsTestLoggedInNoUsers.description: Message indicating that no users were found

diagnosticsTestLoggedInTimedOut.description: Message when the diagnostics page gets no response from the extension

diagnosticsTestValidUserDescription.message: Vérifie que au moins un utilisateur connecté est inscrit à une école où Hapara Highlights est activée

diagnosticsTestValidUserErrorRequesting.description: Message indicating an error while requesting users from the extension
diagnosticsTestValidUserErrorRequesting.message: Erreur pendant la demande d'informations utilisateurs de l'extension

diagnosticsTestValidUserFoundValidUser.description: Message indicating successfully found a single valid user

diagnosticsTestValidUserMultipleUsers.description: Message indicating multiple valid users were found
diagnosticsTestValidUserMultipleUsers.message: Nous avons trouvé plusieurs utilisateurs valides: $users$

diagnosticsTestValidUserMultipleUsersSig.description: Content of the log-out link to resolve the multiple user issue
diagnosticsTestValidUserMultipleUsersSig.message: Veuillez déconnecter de votre compte Google

diagnosticsTestValidUserNoValidUser.description: Message indicating no valid users were found
diagnosticsTestValidUserNoValidUser.message: Nous avons trouvé aucun utilisateur valide $reason$

diagnosticsTestValidUserTimeout.description: Message for when testing valid users times out
diagnosticsTestValidUserTimeout.message: Temps épuisé, en attente d'informations utilisateurs valides de l'extension

extDescription.message: Extension de l'étudiant pour Hapara Highlights

lockingNotificationDuration1.description: Countdown indicator for locking notifications (when seconds = 1)

lockingNotificationDuration2Plus.description: Countdown indicator for locking notifications (when seconds > 1)

lockingNotificationStartNowButton.description: Text on pop-up button that forces locking to start immediately

lockingNotificationTitle.description: Title of the pop-up notifications for tab locking

lockingNotificationTitleBlocked.description: Title of the pop-up notifications for tab locking - filter

lockingNotificationTitleFocused.description: Title of the pop-up notifications for tab locking - focused

messagePopupReplyButton.description: Text label for the reply button on a pop-up message

messagePopupTitle.description: Title of messages received from a teacher (on pop-ups)

messageTabReplyTitle.description: Title of messages received from a teacher (on tabs)

messageTabSendButton.description: Text on the send reply button

messageTabSendError.description: Messaged displayed when there's an error sending a reply. Indicates the user should try again.
messageTabSendError.message: Il y a eu une erreur dans l'envoi de votre message.  Essayer de nouveau.

messageTabSendingText.description: Text to display while sending the reply

messageTabSentText.description: Text to display after the reply is sent

messageTabTitle.description: Title of messages received from a teacher (on tabs)
